channel.title: Please help. problem with adding NPC's to runescape
channel.description: okay so ii have the 314 or 316 source and client or whatever... when i add a npc to the game, i try to log in and it says connection lost... wtf please help me.

item.title: Please help. problem with adding NPC's to runescape
item.dc:creator: @Shadow742000 Shadow742000
item.description:
@Shadow742000 wrote:

i have another question though (and i dont want to be a topic spammer or anything) so…
how do i embed my runescape server into a website?
also, i have a no-ip thingy setup but how do i make it log me into that ip everytime i start my server up?

Read full topic
item.source: Please help. problem with adding NPC's to runescape

item.title: Please help. problem with adding NPC's to runescape
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

At certain points you need to use spaces and some need to be tabs. Here’s an example.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help. problem with adding NPC's to runescape

item.title: Please help. problem with adding NPC's to runescape
item.dc:creator: @Shadow742000 Shadow742000
item.description:
@Shadow742000 wrote:

oh okay, thats the problem then, i used tabs…
thanks very much, its hard to find help on this site…

Read full topic
item.source: Please help. problem with adding NPC's to runescape

item.title: Please help. problem with adding NPC's to runescape
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

You messed up the spawning config file. It’s autospwan.cfg for delta. Not sure for PI

NOTE: Spaces are NOT the same as tabs in config files!

Read full topic
